dateCreated.description: The date/time of when the entry was created.

dateModified.description: The date/time of when the entry was modified.

dateDeleted.description: The date/time of when the entry was deleted, as we never actually remove items.

userIdentity.description: The identity of the user which added the entry to the stream.

entryObject.description: The object to associate with the entry as JSON-LD.

index.description: The index of the entry in the stream.

proofId.description: The id of the immutable proof.

description: Interface describing an entry for the stream.
